TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AsyncCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AsyncCallback(ar As IAsyncResult)
type AsyncCallback = delegate of IAsyncResult -> unit
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed AsyncCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

span.span: The result of the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 引用在相应异步操作完成时调用的方法。

span.span: References a method to be called when a corresponding asynchronous operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 委托在单独的线程中处理异步操作的结果。Use an delegate to process the results of an asynchronous operation in a separate thread. 委托表示在异步操作完成时调用的回调方法。The delegate represents a callback method that is called when the asynchronous operation completes. 回调方法采用 参数，该参数随后用于获取异步操作的结果。The callback method takes an parameter, which is subsequently used to obtain the results of the asynchronous operation. 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[使用 Asynccallback 委托结束异步操作](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/using-an-asynccallback-delegate-to-end-an-asynchronous-operation)，以及在[基于事件的异步模式（EAP）](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap)中[使用 asynccallback 委托和状态对象](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/using-an-asynccallback-delegate-and-state-object)。For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Using an AsyncCallback Delegate to End an Asynchronous Operation](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/using-an-asynccallback-delegate-to-end-an-asynchronous-operation) and [Using an AsyncCallback Delegate and State Object](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/using-an-asynccallback-delegate-and-state-object) in [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern (EAP)](/dotnet/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap). ## Examples 下面的代码示例展示了如何使用 类中的异步方法，检索用户指定计算机的域名系统 (DNS) 信息。The following code example demonstrates using asynchronous methods in the class to retrieve Domain Name System (DNS) information for user-specified computers. 此示例创建引用 `ProcessDnsInformation` 方法的 委托。This example creates an delegate that references the `ProcessDnsInformation` method. 每次异步请求获取 DNS 信息，都会调用一次此方法。This method is called once for each asynchronous request for DNS information. [!code-csharp[AsyncDesignPattern#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDesignPattern/CS/AsyncDelegateNoStateObject.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AsyncDesignPattern#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncDesignPattern/VB/AsyncDelegateNoState.vb#4)]
